biotools.summary: Completely automated and computationally efficient protein 3D structure refinement method which based on an iterative and highly convergent energy minimization algorithm with a powerful all-atom composite physics and knowledge-based force fields and hydrogen bonding (HB) network optimization technique.

bioschemas.name: i3Drefine
bioschemas.summary: Completely automated and computationally efficient protein 3D structure refinement method which based on an iterative and highly convergent energy minimization algorithm with a powerful all-atom composite physics and knowledge-based force fields and hydrogen bonding (HB) network optimization technique.
